member.name: M:CStreamer.IElementExtensions.GetElementName(CStreamer.Plugins.Interfaces.IElement)
member.summary:
Gets the name for a given Elements type.
These names can either be registered using the or will be generated using the Classname. Classnames ending in Src, Sink, or Element will get these parts removed.
member.param: the element to resolve the name of.
member.returns: The factoryType name of the given type.

member.name: M:CStreamer.IElementExtensions.GetElementName(System.Type)
member.summary:
Gets the name for a given Type.
These names can either be registered using the or will be generated using the Classname. Classnames ending in Src, Sink, or Element will get these parts removed.
member.param: the type to resolve the name of.
member.returns: The factoryType name of the given type.

member.name: T:CStreamer.State
member.summary: State of the Pipeline or Element. Pretty Similar to the GStreamer State.

member.name: F:CStreamer.State.Playing
member.summary: Playlist/Element is playing. Data is getting pushed throu it.

member.name: F:CStreamer.State.Ready
member.summary: Playlist/Element is ready. All Elements have finished their initalization. But no data is flowing yet.

member.name: F:CStreamer.State.Stopped
member.summary: Playlist/Element is stopped. No data is flowing Elements may not be initialized yet or may have releases their resources.
